Permissions denied. You can change them in Settings > Apps.
Introductory text Introductory text Introductory text Introductory text

1. This upgrade will not delete your user data, but it is still recommended that you do a good data backup before upgrading.\n2. It will take about 20 minutes for the upgrade process. Please wait patiently after clicking the "upgrade" button. Do not press the power button or the volume button to avoid escalation.The phone will be restarted automatically during the upgrade.\n 3. If you encounter any problems during your use, please visit the "user center" or call the official service hotline 400-898-8666 for support.
How do I roll back to stable version?
Operation instructions Operation instructions Operation instructions

1. “User Center” requires access to the storage, location, Phone, and local account information permissions to provide you with GOME after-sales services (the storage and location permissions are only required if you select China).
2. During use, this app requires Internet access. The following information will also be collected and processed: 
 • Device information, including IMEI, IMSI, MEID, SN, and model number.
 • The name, address, phone number, and email information you provided.
 You can exit the app to terminate information collection and uploading activities.
3. Using the Self service (China) in this app will launch the Phone Manager, GOME Cloud, and Backup features.
By tapping \"Agree\", you will agree to the above terms, LINK_BEGINUser AgreementLINK_END and LINK_BEGINGOME Privacy PolicyLINK_END.
Describe your problem, as well as steps to reproduce. No more than 500 words
You can call the GOME store service hotline:
If you\'e having trouble connecting to a WLAN network possible reasons may be:
1.WLAN is turned off. Go to Settings, turn on WLAN, select a network, and enter the password if prompted.
2.The WLAN psaaword has changed. Rrconnect to the netword and enter the new password.
3.If it\'s only your phone that\'s experiencing this issue, restart WLAN, or restart your phone and try again.
If you\'e having trouble connecting to the Internet, possible reasons may be:
1.Mobile data is turned off. Go to Settings and turn on your mobile data. if you are romaing, turn on data romaing(verifying potential romaing charges beforehand is highly recommended).
2.You do not have an Internet access sevice. Contact your Internet sevice provider to enable GPRS.
4.A software conflict or error has occurred. Restart your phone and try again.
No SIM card was detected. Please make sure there is an insert
The network is unavailable or is in bad condition
Internet connection is not available, please check your network settings
Before submitting the feedback, you need to log in your GOME ID
Please log in your GOME ID first
Before apply for an appointment, please log in your GOME account
Please input information in correct format
Please input information in correct format
Enter your phone number to check progress
Can not connect to the Internet
Describe your problem, no more than 200 words
Can not access to the Internet after turn on data service switch

1、General third party security software, antivirus software easily lead to data conflicts, uninstall such software after the restart, to observe whether the phone is normal. 
2、After the proposed backup of important data, the phone will be returned to the factory settings, without the resumption of data under the premise of using a period of time to see whether the phone is normal. 

If the above methods are invalid, it is recommended that you contact customer service or to after-sales network testing.

1、Long press the power button for more than 10 seconds, try to force restart.
2、Charging half an hour after trying to restart, because the power is too low to boot, just plug into the charger may not light screen, but the breath light flashing. 

If the above methods are invalid, it is recommended that you contact customer service or to after-sales network testing.

1、If the WLAN hotspot is the encryption hotspot, enter the correct password and case sensitive. 
2、Please put your cell phone in the WLAN hotspot effective distance. The distance may cause the network to automatically disconnect.
3、WLAN may have reached the maximum number of connections. Try connecting to other available networks. 
4、Some public WLAN hotspots may need to be logged on at the web site, and you can consult the WLAN hotspot provider. 
5、Please check whether the wireless router opens the MAC address filtering function. You can set the MAC address of your cell phone as a trusted MAC address. 

If the above methods are invalid, it is recommended that you contact customer service or to after-sales network testing.

1、Into the mobile housekeeper, will automatically open a key optimization. 
2、Into the mobile housekeeper interface, click cleaning acceleration.
3、Enter the mobile phone Housekeeper - > clean accelerated depth cleaning according to the screen - >, clean up junk files in mobile phone. 
4、Restart cell phone.

If the above methods are invalid, it is recommended that you contact customer service or to after-sales network testing.

1、Please make sure the phone is inserted into the correct SIM/USIM card. Different formats of mobile phones support SIM/USIM is not the same, please refer to the specific mobile phone providers. 
2、Please check to see if the Internet has been opened. Please contact the operator to open Internet access. 
3、Please check whether you have overdue payment. Operators may stop offering internet access to already paid users. 
4、Please check to see if the flow display is set. If the traffic limit is set, the data cannot be used when the traffic is limited. 
5、You may not be able to use the Internet after you recharge your phone. Please restart your cell phone. 

If the above methods are invalid, it is recommended that you contact customer service or to after-sales network testing.

1、During the call, use volume key to turn up the sound. 
2、Check if the film, holster and so on are shielded from the receiver. If it is recommended, remove or replace it. 
3、Change the time, location, and contacts to rule out any network problems. 

If the above methods are invalid, it is recommended that you contact customer service or to after-sales network testing.

1、If the charge is not fully charged for a long time, please confirm whether the original charger is used to charge the mobile phone, whether there is a charging interface, bad contact and so on. 
2、It is recommended not to use the mobile phone for a long time during charging, and do not place the mobile phone in a poor heat dissipation environment. 
3、If you use the output current smaller power charge, charging will be slower, it is recommended to use the original charger or replace the output current slightly larger power charge. 

If the above methods are invalid, it is recommended that you contact customer service or to after-sales network testing.

1、Mobile phones only support third party applications in APK format. Please check that the format is correct. 
2、The downloaded third party application may not be compatible, and it is recommended that you try to download other similar applications. 
3、You need to verify that you have trusted the program source. Enter the settings - > Advanced Settings - > security, select unknown sources, and then reinstall the application. 

If the above methods are invalid, it is recommended that you contact customer service or to after-sales network testing.
